query:
INSERT INTO `emailTemplates` (`name`, `subject`, `body`, `category`) VALUES
('Cold Outreach - Payment Processing', 'Reduce Your Payment Processing Fees by 30%', 'Hi {{contactName}},

I noticed {{companyName}} processes credit card payments. Most businesses overpay on processing fees without realizing it.

We help companies like yours save 20-40% on payment processing while improving approval rates.

Would you be open to a 15-minute call this week to see if we can help {{companyName}} save money?

Best regards,
{{agentName}}', 'cold_outreach'),

('Follow-up After No Answer', 'Quick Follow-up - {{companyName}}', 'Hi {{contactName}},

I tried reaching you earlier today regarding payment processing savings for {{companyName}}.

I understand you''re busy, so I''ll keep this brief:

• We typically save businesses 20-40% on processing fees
• No upfront costs or long-term contracts
• Quick 5-minute analysis to see your potential savings

When would be a good time for a brief call?

Best,
{{agentName}}', 'follow_up'),

('Quote Follow-up', 'Your Custom Quote - {{companyName}}', 'Hi {{contactName}},

Thank you for your time on our call. As discussed, I''ve prepared a custom quote for {{companyName}}.

Based on your current processing volume of {{processingVolume}}, we can offer:

• Effective rate: {{effectiveRate}}
• Estimated monthly savings: ${{monthlySavings}}
• No setup fees or cancellation penalties

The quote is attached. I''m available to answer any questions.

When can we move forward?

Best regards,
{{agentName}}', 'quote'),

('Statement Agreed', 'Next Steps - {{companyName}} Processing Review', 'Hi {{contactName}},

Great speaking with you! I''m glad we agree that reviewing your current processing fees makes sense.

To prepare an accurate quote, I just need:

1. Last month''s processing statement (PDF)
2. Approximate monthly volume
3. Current effective rate (if known)

Once I have these, I can have your custom proposal ready within 24 hours.

Can you send those over today?

Thanks,
{{agentName}}', 'follow_up'),

('Closing - Final Push', 'Last Chance to Lock In These Rates - {{companyName}}', 'Hi {{contactName}},

I wanted to reach out one final time about the quote I sent for {{companyName}}.

Our current rate offer of {{effectiveRate}} is only guaranteed through the end of this month.

If you''d like to move forward and start saving immediately, let me know and I can have everything set up within 48 hours.

Otherwise, I''ll assume the timing isn''t right and will close your file.

Let me know!

Best,
{{agentName}}', 'closing'),

('Nurture - Check In', 'Checking In - {{companyName}}', 'Hi {{contactName}},

I hope all is well with you and {{companyName}}!

I wanted to check in and see if your payment processing needs have changed since we last spoke.

Many of our clients who weren''t ready initially have come back when:

• Their current contract expired
• Processing fees increased
• They expanded and needed better rates

If any of these apply to you, I''d be happy to revisit our conversation.

No pressure - just staying in touch!

Best,
{{agentName}}', 'nurture');
